EmailTemplate.subject: I Have X-Ray Vision into My Shoppers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
What if you had x-ray vision into each of your shoppers?
Or knew if they’d move completely online or to self-checkout only or change brands?
What attracts shoppers? What repels them?
It’s a big question—and a fascinating field of study. It’s exactly why:
NCR leads with research, so you can adapt to market changes.
Start with a new e-book <[[https://www.ncr.com/content/dam/web/documents/landing-pages/brand-campaign/brand-campaign-retail_v2.pdf]]>, where we outline some of our latest consumer research. It’s not only eye-opening; it’s instructive, something you can easily create a plan from. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
